name: Viktor (itch)
description:
Help little Victor find his way in the creepy dungeon. Face vicious monsters, burning acid and dark abyss. 
Will there be an end to little Victor’s bloodcurdling journey? 

Or is it an endless loop? 

Find out in this tiny top-down dungeon crawler!



Controls:
WSAD+click
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Created on pure js + WebGL
made by Jakub Orliński "Palemek" 
audio by Emilia Macionczyk
